revision.comment: Added updated links to new firmware versions of OpenWRT
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WNR1000 |revision=v2 |upc= |ean= |asin=B00894WP4S,B001UI4RTG |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/25/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY309300122 |ic_id=4054A-09300122 |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7240 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3205DM2I-12G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU561622FTP-D43 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, internal,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1),, JP2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9285;AR9285-AL1A, BF5589C, 0945, KOREA; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.15;OpenWrt-deriv; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=NETGEAR |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:24:B2, 00:26:F2, 30:46:9A, A0:21:B7, C0:3F:0E, C4:3D:C7, E0:91:F5 |oui_eth=00:24:B2, 00:26:F2, 30:46:9A, A0:21:B7, C0:3F:0E, C4:3D:C7, E0:91:F5 }} {{TagLine|N150 Wireless Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=WNR1000v2}} "2976333104" is silkscreened on one production model board. :The same basic hardware is used for the [[Netgear WN604]]. :The same hardware is also used in [[Netgear WNR612v2]]. :all ports (both uplink and downlink) feature automatic MDI/crossover ==Additional external links== ===Wikis=== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wnr1000_v2 ''Netgear WNR1000 v2'' on the the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] *{{TechInfoDepot|Netgear_WNR1000_v2}} ===Reviews=== *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/en/component/content/article/36-reviews/93-netgear-wnr1000v2.html On '''FoxNetwork'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/t/wnr1000v2-builds-for-netgear/39360 ''OpenWRT Builds for NETGEAR WNR1000V2/VC'' on '''forum.openwrt.org'''] *[https://gist.github.com/SaltwaterC/ef49c8a4df81c8896153 ''Flashing to OpenWRT from Factory Firmware'' on '''gist.github.com'''] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=263053 ''Netgear WNR1000v2: some success!'' on '''forum.openwrt.org'''] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=55144 ''Netgear WN604/WNR612v2/WNR1000v2'' on '''forum.openwrt.org'''] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=77302 ''Netgear WNR1000v2 Request'' on '''dd-wrt.com'''] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=146615 ''Netgear WNR1000v2 Spec.'' on '''dd-wrt.com'''] ===PSU=== The power adapter included with the device is a '''PI Electronics (H.K.) Ltd.''' :T012LF1209 16100-2LF (12V, 1A), Netgear P/N: 332-10166-01. :Centre positive 5,5mm/2,1mm barrel. Efficiency Level V, :emits high frequency squeal/high-pitched electronic whine :sound WNR1000v2 itself is silent. UL File Number: E186735. {{hasPowerSupply |brand=PI Electronics |model=T012LF1209 16100-2LF |manuf_country=China |input_v=100-120 |input_a=0.5 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=1 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |output_OD=5.5 |output_ID=2.1 |output_LEN=9.5 |style= }} ==Serial== ===Pinout=== 
---> to AR9285 Wifi Controller

         UART       JP2
                     â€¢
(GND) (RxD) (TxD) [3.3V]

<--- to AR7140 CPU
